AUROC=0.5239171425412318	AUPRC=0.5584378395194931	Accuracy=0.519563621105633	Recall=0.2514607679465776	Precision=0.5482256596906279	f1_score=0.34477825464949924

######NOTE#######
#According to help_documentation of sklearn.metrics.classification_report:in binary classification, recall of the positive class is also known as sensitivity; recall of the negative class is specificity#

              precision    recall  f1-score   support

     control       0.51      0.79      0.62      4741
        case       0.55      0.25      0.34      4792

   micro avg       0.52      0.52      0.52      9533
   macro avg       0.53      0.52      0.48      9533
weighted avg       0.53      0.52      0.48      9533
